Describe the change. Link related issues.

- [ ] Feature

## How to test

Steps or smoke commands (e.g., `python scripts/smoke_test.py`, `--run "help; board list"`).

## Checklist

- [ ] Includes tests or smoke verification

- [ ] No secrets in code/logs
- [ ] Adheres to permissions and security model
